channel.title: Developer Guide on WebLogic Image Tool
channel.description: Recent content in Developer Guide on WebLogic Image Tool

item.title: Build from source
item.description: The Image Tool installer is available for download on the Releases page. If you want to build the installer from source instead of downloading it, follow these instructions: Download and install JDK 8u261+. Download and install Maven 3.6.3+. Clone this repository to your local environment using one of the options under Code near the top of this page. From inside the top-level directory of the cloned project, weblogic-image-tool, using Maven, execute one or more of these phases: validate - Validate the project is correct and all necessary information is available.

item.title: Contribute to WIT
item.description: Oracle welcomes contributions to this repository from anyone. If you want to submit a pull request to fix a bug or enhance an existing feature, please first open an issue and link to that issue when you submit your pull request. If you have any questions about a possible submission, feel free to open an issue too. Contributing to the WebLogic Image Tool repository Pull requests can be made under The Oracle Contributor Agreement (OCA).
